description.text: Familiarity with the military traditions of your homeland inspires uncommon valor in you.

sections.Benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on all saving throws against fear effects. Whenever a fear effect targets you and fails to affect you (either because of a successful saving throw or because of immunity to fear), you gain a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and CMB checks against the creature that attempted to use the fear affect on you for 1 round.
sections.Note: Note If using the optional Stamina Pool rules, the following trick may be used with this feat.
